verses.name: Ezekiel 4:10
verses.text: And thy meat which thou shalt eat shall be by weight, twenty shekels a day: from time to time shalt thou eat it.

verses.name: Ezekiel 4:11
verses.text: Thou shalt drink also water by measure, the sixth part of an hin: from time to time shalt thou drink.

verses.name: Ezekiel 4:12
verses.text: And thou shalt eat it as barley cakes, and thou shalt bake it with dung that cometh out of man, in their sight.

verses.name: Ezekiel 4:13
verses.text: And the Lord said, Even thus shall the children of Israel eat their defiled bread among the Gentiles, whither I will drive them.
